<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- HexagonPacketizer.cpp - VLIW packetizer ----------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This implements a simple VLIW packetizer using DFA. The packetizer works on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// machine basic blocks. For each instruction I in BB, the packetizer consults</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the DFA to see if machine resources are available to execute I. If so, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packetizer checks if I depends on any instruction J in the current packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no dependency is found, I is added to current packet and machine resource</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is marked as taken. If any dependency is found, a target API call is made to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// prune the dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop over all basic blocks and remove KILL pseudo-instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These instructions confuse the dependence analysis. Consider:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// D0 = ...   (Insn 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R0 = KILL R0, D0 (Insn 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// R0 = ... (Insn 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here, Insn 1 will result in the dependence graph not emitting an output</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dependence between Insn 0 and Insn 2 This can lead to incorrect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packetization</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/mb">MB</a> : MF) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> RE = RB;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can be new value store?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Following restrictions are to be respected in convert a store into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a new value store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 If an instruction uses auto-increment, its address register cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    be a new-value register. Arch Spec 5.4.2.1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 If an instruction uses absolute-set addressing mode, its address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    register cannot be a new-value register. Arch Spec 5.4.2.1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3 If an instruction produces a 64-bit result, its registers cannot be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    as new-value registers. Arch Spec 5.4.2.2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 4 If the instruction that sets the new-value register is conditional, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    the instruction that uses the new-value register must also be conditional,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and both must always have their predicates evaluate identically.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Arch Spec 5.4.2.3.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 5 There is an implied restriction that a packet cannot have another store,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if there is a new value store in the packet. Corollary: if there is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    already a store in a packet, there can not be a new value store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Arch Spec: 3.4.4.2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#ac257b1d3de2b7254c046a5591191e26c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#ac257b1d3de2b7254c046a5591191e26c">HexagonPacketizerList::canPromoteToNewValueStore</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;PacketMI, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DepReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we are looking at the store, that can be promoted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HII-&gt;mayBeNewStore(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure there is dependency and can be new value&#39;d.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;Val = <a href="#a459ea26e1f92eab1e5645dafc995a2de">getStoreValueOperand</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinstrdesc">MCInstrDesc</a>&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid">MCID</a> = PacketMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a75a5f7e3b3d4ec79610b4e556d2f35ce">getDesc</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// First operand is always the result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterclass">TargetRegisterClass</a> &#42;PacketRC = HII-&gt;getRegClass(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid">MCID</a>, 0, HRI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a12b3d85290b815a7b870ea1b841d4288">MF</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// New-value stores are of class NV (slot 0), dual stores require class ST</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in slot 0 (PRM 5.5).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      predRegNumSrc = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">      predRegClass = HRI-&gt;getMinimalPhysRegClass(predRegNumSrc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (predRegClass == &amp;Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((predRegClass == &amp;Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;predicate register not found in a predicated PacketMI instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get predicate register used in new-value store instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.isReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      predRegNumDst = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">      predRegClass = HRI-&gt;getMinimalPhysRegClass(predRegNumDst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (predRegClass == &amp;Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((predRegClass == &amp;Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;predicate register not found in a predicated MI instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// New-value register producer and user (store) need to satisfy these</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// constraints:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) Both instructions should be predicated on the same register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) If producer of the new-value register is .new predicated then store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should also be .new predicated and if producer is not .new predicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then store should not be .new predicated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 3) Both new-value register producer and user should have same predicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sense, i.e, either both should be negated or both should be non-negated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (predRegNumDst != predRegNumSrc ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HII-&gt;isDotNewInst(PacketMI) != HII-&gt;isDotNewInst(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, HII) != <a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(PacketMI, HII))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that other than the new-value register no other store instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// register has been modified in the same packet. Predicate registers can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modified by they should not be modified between the producer and the store</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction as it will make them both conditional on different values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We already know this to be true for all the instructions before and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// including PacketMI. Howerver, we need to perform the check for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// remaining instructions in the packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StartCheck = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;TempSU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;TempMI = &#42;TempSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Following condition is true for all the instructions until PacketMI is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reached (StartCheck is set to 0 before the for loop).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// StartCheck flag is 1 for all the instructions after PacketMI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;TempMI != &amp;PacketMI &amp;&amp; !StartCheck) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Start processing only after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// encountering PacketMI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StartCheck = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (&amp;TempMI == &amp;PacketMI) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t want to check PacketMI for dependence.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isReg() &amp;&amp; TempSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a66e91c5407ade0326e5dbd87e986e648">modifiesRegister</a>(MO.getReg(), HRI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure that for non-POST&#95;INC stores:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 The only use of reg is DepReg and no other registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    This handles base+index registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    The following store can not be dot new.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    Eg.   r0 = add(r0, #3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          memw(r1+r0&lt;&lt;#2) = r0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HII-&gt;isPostIncrement(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> opNum = 0; opNum &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getNumOperands()-1; opNum++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;MO = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(opNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#a4c9594c955fec80c73ddd964b5efd554">isReg</a>() &amp;&amp; MO.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>() == DepReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If data definition is because of implicit definition of the register,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do not newify the store. Eg.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %r9 = ZXTH %r12, implicit %d6, implicit-def %r12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// S2&#95;storerh&#95;io %r8, 2, killed %r12; mem:ST2&#91;%scevgep343&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MO : PacketMI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a999b8f3e58e7ca479f26445bae791a7c">operands</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isRegMask() &amp;&amp; MO.clobbersPhysReg(DepReg))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!MO.isReg() || !MO.isDef() || !MO.isImplicit())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> R = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R == DepReg || HRI-&gt;isSuperRegister(DepReg, R))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle imp-use of super reg case. There is a target independent side</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// change that should prevent this situation but I am handling it for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// just-in-case. For example, we cannot newify R2 in the following case:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %r3 = A2&#95;tfrsi 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// S2&#95;storeri&#95;io killed %r0, 0, killed %r2, implicit killed %d1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MO : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isReg() &amp;&amp; MO.isUse() &amp;&amp; MO.isImplicit() &amp;&amp; MO.getReg() == DepReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can be dot new store.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Can this MI to promoted to either new value store or new value jump.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a9085e6f205a2f9604a6458faa9a18d49"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a9085e6f205a2f9604a6458faa9a18d49">HexagonPacketizerList::canPromoteToNewValue</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PacketSU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DepReg,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> &amp;MII) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HII-&gt;mayBeNewStore(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check to see the store can be new value&#39;ed.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Go through the packet instructions and search for an anti dependency between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// them and DepReg from MI. Consider this case:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trying to add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a) %r1 = TFRI&#95;cdNotPt %p3, 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to this packet:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   b) %p0 = C2&#95;or killed %p3, killed %p0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c) %p3 = C2&#95;tfrrp %r23</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   d) %r1 = C2&#95;cmovenewit %p3, 4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The P3 from a) and d) will be complements after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a)&#39;s P3 is converted to .new form</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Anti-dep between c) and b) is irrelevant for this case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a642903485b484d638fafe7da8142cdd8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a642903485b484d638fafe7da8142cdd8">HexagonPacketizerList::restrictingDepExistInPacket</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DepReg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PacketSUDep = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>.find(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only care for dependencies to predicated instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HII-&gt;isPredicated(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scheduling Unit for current insn in the packet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PacketSU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look at dependencies between current members of the packet and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate defining instruction MI. Make sure that dependency is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on the exact register we care about.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a65e96694f0d2eef93a9653beba7d12dc">isSucc</a>(PacketSUDep)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#aab4a86c51e6b126c9c6ef58dbb574431">Succs</a>.size(); ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Dep = PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#aab4a86c51e6b126c9c6ef58dbb574431">Succs</a>&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dep.getSUnit() == PacketSUDep &amp;&amp; Dep.getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Dep.getReg() == DepReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Gets the predicate register of a predicated instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949" lineLink="#a68cebe53cac420d7b1dcde0a79304cc0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a68cebe53cac420d7b1dcde0a79304cc0">getPredicatedRegister</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo">HexagonInstrInfo</a> &#42;QII) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We use the following rule: The first predicate register that is a use is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the predicate register of a predicated instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(QII-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagoninstrinfo/#a08a6fa663190c41b23870c4037019577">isPredicated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Must be predicated instruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isReg() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getReg() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isUse() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass.contains(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unknown instruction operand layout&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given two predicated instructions, this function detects whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the predicates are complements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a0256920aada1bf35dc3c90cbfba10e5d"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a0256920aada1bf35dc3c90cbfba10e5d">HexagonPacketizerList::arePredicatesComplements</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MI1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MI2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t know the predicate sense of the instructions bail out early, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need it later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(MI1, HII) == <a href="#a8d60d6c6e0f8d29d2ee342209c93a36ea1418e0de5990064da570cea12cf7059b">PK&#95;Unknown</a> ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(MI2, HII) == <a href="#a8d60d6c6e0f8d29d2ee342209c93a36ea1418e0de5990064da570cea12cf7059b">PK&#95;Unknown</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scheduling unit for candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>&#91;&amp;MI1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One corner case deals with the following scenario:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Trying to add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a) %r24 = A2&#95;tfrt %p0, %r25</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to this packet:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   b) %r25 = A2&#95;tfrf %p0, %r24</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   c) %p0 = C2&#95;cmpeqi %r26, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On general check a) and b) are complements, but presence of c) will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// convert a) to .new form, and then it is not a complement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We attempt to detect it by analyzing existing dependencies in the packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Analyze relationships between all existing members of the packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for Anti dependecy on the same predicate reg as used in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// candidate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Scheduling Unit for current insn in the packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;PacketSU = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>.find(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)-&gt;second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this instruction in the packet is succeeded by the candidate...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a65e96694f0d2eef93a9653beba7d12dc">isSucc</a>(SU)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#aab4a86c51e6b126c9c6ef58dbb574431">Succs</a>.size(); ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Dep = PacketSU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#aab4a86c51e6b126c9c6ef58dbb574431">Succs</a>&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The corner case exist when there is true data dependency between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// candidate and one of current packet members, this dep is on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate reg, and there already exist anti dep on the same pred in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Dep.getSUnit() == SU &amp;&amp; Dep.getKind() == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732af91df2221290eaa1a368403ffad49a26">SDep::Data</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass.contains(Dep.getReg())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here I know that I is predicate setting instruction with true</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data dep to candidate on the register we care about - c) in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above example. Now I need to see if there is an anti dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from c) to any other instruction in the same packet on the pred</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reg of interest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a642903485b484d638fafe7da8142cdd8">restrictingDepExistInPacket</a>(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, Dep.getReg()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the above case does not apply, check regular complement condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check that the predicate register is the same and that the predicate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sense is different We also need to differentiate .old vs. .new: !p0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is not complementary to p0.new.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PReg1 = <a href="#a68cebe53cac420d7b1dcde0a79304cc0">getPredicatedRegister</a>(MI1, HII);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PReg2 = <a href="#a68cebe53cac420d7b1dcde0a79304cc0">getPredicatedRegister</a>(MI2, HII);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PReg1 == PReg2 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass.contains(PReg1) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">         Hexagon::PredRegsRegClass.contains(PReg2) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(MI1, HII) != <a href="#a5fe53637e6201b2fd01d8a0a954c4a6a">getPredicateSense</a>(MI2, HII) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">         HII-&gt;isDotNewInst(MI1) == HII-&gt;isDotNewInst(MI2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Initialize packetizer flags.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a5734374d530ee7ee7a3fdda172fc22cd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a5734374d530ee7ee7a3fdda172fc22cd">HexagonPacketizerList::initPacketizerState</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Dependence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  PromotedToDotNew = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GlueToNewValueJump = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  GlueAllocframeStore = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  FoundSequentialDependence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ChangedOffset = <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm-c/datatypes-h/#ad0d744f05898e32d01f73f8af3cd2071">INT64&#95;MAX</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Regmasks are not reflected in the scheduling dependency graph, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we need to check them manually. This code assumes that regmasks only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// occur on calls, and the problematic case is when we add an instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// defining a register R to a packet that has a call that clobbers R via</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a regmask. Those cannot be packetized together, because the call will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be executed last. That&#39;s also a reson why it is ok to add a call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clobbering R to a packet that defines R.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Not always safe to do this translation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DAG Builder attempts to reduce dependence edges using transitive</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// nature of dependencies. Here is an example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r0 = tfr&#95;pt ... (1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r0 = tfr&#95;pf ... (2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// r0 = tfr&#95;pt ... (3)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There will be an output dependence between (1)-&gt;(2) and (2)-&gt;(3).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// However, there is no dependence edge between (1)-&gt;(3). This results</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in all 3 instructions going in the same packet. We ignore dependce</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only once to avoid this situation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Itr = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(IgnoreDepMIs, &amp;J);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Itr != IgnoreDepMIs.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Dependence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
