<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StoreJ &amp;&amp; LoadI &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a5a49db9f3f84ee0258f9db321f1c7f9f">alias</a>(J, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">          FoundSequentialDependence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!StoreJ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LoadJ || (!LoadI &amp;&amp; !StoreI)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1561"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If J is neither load nor store, assume a dependency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1562"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If J is a load, but I is neither, also assume a dependency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1563"><span class="doxyHighlight">          FoundSequentialDependence = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store followed by store: not OK on V2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Store followed by load: not OK on all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Load followed by store: OK on all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Load followed by load: OK on all.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case for ALLOCFRAME: even though there is dependency</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between ALLOCFRAME and subsequent store, allow it to be packetized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in a same packet. This implies that the store is using the caller&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SP. Hence, offset needs to be updated accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DepType == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732af91df2221290eaa1a368403ffad49a26">SDep::Data</a> &amp;&amp; J.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a0363204b5fbab08a46f5a7cd7f376f78">getOpcode</a>() == Hexagon::S2&#95;allocframe) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1578"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOpcode();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1579"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1580"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::S2&#95;storerd&#95;io:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1581"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::S2&#95;storeri&#95;io:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1582"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::S2&#95;storerh&#95;io:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1583"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Hexagon::S2&#95;storerb&#95;io:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1584"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getOperand(0).getReg() == HRI-&gt;getStackRegister()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1585"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since this store is to be glued with allocframe in the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1586"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// packet, it will use SP of the previous stack frame, i.e.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller&#39;s SP. Therefore, we need to recalculate offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// according to this change.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">            GlueAllocframeStore = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#abf8fdc79c6fcc0fb997214d040de1063">useCallersSP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (GlueAllocframeStore)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are certain anti-dependencies that cannot be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Specifically:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   J2&#95;call ... implicit-def %r0   ; SUJ</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   R0 = ...                   ; SUI</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Those cannot be packetized together, since the call will observe</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the effect of the assignment to R0.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((DepType == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732abe9561936346ab5c5e22fe544994b06e">SDep::Anti</a> || DepType == <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep/#a07333f8ba53e0454b7ec6365860c0732a011a1d87822a7f70efee9e430a7ccc36">SDep::Output</a>) &amp;&amp; J.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a30e7d619f3195fd890116da8b3ed6bab">isCall</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if I defines any volatile register. We should also check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// registers that the call may read, but these happen to be a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// subset of the volatile register set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.operands()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!J.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a2380c209ae5339835b5e6ea6d5c197ad">readsRegister</a>(R, HRI) &amp;&amp; !J.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a66e91c5407ade0326e5dbd87e986e648">modifiesRegister</a>(R, HRI))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.isRegMask()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If I has a regmask assume dependency.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip over remaining anti-dependences. Two instructions that are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1624"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// anti-dependent can share a packet, since in most such cases all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operands are read before any modifications take place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1626"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The exceptions are branch and call instructions, since they are</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If TinyCore with Duplexes is enabled, check if this MI can form a Duplex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with any other instruction in the existing packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;HST = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getParent()-&gt;getParent()-&gt;getSubtarget&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonsubtarget">HexagonSubtarget</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constraint 1: Only one duplex allowed per packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constraint 2: Consider duplex checks only if there is atleast one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1847"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction in a packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1848"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Constraint 3: If one of the existing instructions in the packet has a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1849"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SLOT0 only instruction that can not be duplexed, do not attempt to form</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplexes. (TODO: This will invalidate the L4&#95;return&#42; instructions to form a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplex)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HST.isTinyCoreWithDuplex() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>.size() &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1853"><span class="doxyHighlight">      !PacketHasDuplex) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for SLOT0 only non-duplexable instruction in packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1855"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MJ : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1856"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PacketHasSLOT0OnlyInsn |= HII-&gt;isPureSlot0(&#42;MJ);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1857"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the Big Core Opcode (dup&#95;&#42;).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode = HII-&gt;getDuplexOpcode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode &gt;= 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1860"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We now have an instruction that can be duplexed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1861"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;MJ : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1862"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HII-&gt;isDuplexPair(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, &#42;MJ) &amp;&amp; !PacketHasSLOT0OnlyInsn) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1863"><span class="doxyHighlight">          PacketHasDuplex = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1864"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1865"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1866"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1867"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it can not be duplexed, check if there is a valid transition in DFA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1868"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the original opcode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1869"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;MIRef = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1870"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MIRef.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a9117508fb00fda14207e7f968389544c">setDesc</a>(HII-&gt;get(Opcode));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1871"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#aa563675151ea61dfc14e8dd078327bc9">ResourceTracker</a>-&gt;canReserveResources(MIRef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1874"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1876"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1878"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// V60 forward scheduling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1879" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a82b468a911dfb66ebd0e9dfafd6ec6a1"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a82b468a911dfb66ebd0e9dfafd6ec6a1">HexagonPacketizerList::calcStall</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether the previous packet is in a different loop. If this is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, there is little point in trying to avoid a stall because that would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// favor the rare case (loop entry) over the common case (loop iteration).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1883"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1884"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: We should really be able to check all the incoming edges if this is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first packet in a basic block, so we can avoid stalls from the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backedge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!OldPacketMIs.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;OldBB = OldPacketMIs.front()-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ThisBB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>.getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a3e4011f6cd53120ad9eff880c89c4ee9">MLI</a>-&gt;getLoopFor(OldBB) != <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a3e4011f6cd53120ad9eff880c89c4ee9">MLI</a>-&gt;getLoopFor(ThisBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>&#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SUI)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the latency is 0 and there is a data dependence between this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction and any instruction in the current packet, we disregard any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// potential stalls due to the instructions in the previous packet. Most of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the instruction pairs that can go together in the same packet have 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latency between them. The exceptions are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 NewValueJumps as they&#39;re generated much later and the latencies can&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be changed at that point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 .cur instructions, if its consumer has a 0 latency successor (such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1906"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .new). In this case, the latency between .cur and the consumer stays</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-zero even though we can have  both .cur and .new in the same packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1908"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Changing the latency to 0 is not an option as it causes software pipeliner</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to not pipeline in some cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1910"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1912"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1913"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   I1:  v6.cur = vmem(r0++#1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   I2:  v7 = valign(v6,v4,r2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1915"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   I3:  vmem(r5++#1) = v7.new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1916"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1917"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Here I2 and I3 has 0 cycle latency, but I1 and I2 has 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1918"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1919"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;J : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a6ce4208a9adff0d4c41486339da72880">CurrentPacketMIs</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUJ = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>&#91;J&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1921"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Pred : SUI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred.getSUnit() == SUJ)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1923"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Pred.getLatency() == 0 &amp;&amp; Pred.isAssignedRegDep()) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1924"><span class="doxyHighlight">            HII-&gt;isNewValueJump(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) || HII-&gt;isToBeScheduledASAP(&#42;J, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1925"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1926"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1927"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1928"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if the latency is greater than one between this instruction and any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1929"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction in the previous packet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1930"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;J : OldPacketMIs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1931"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SUJ = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwpacketizerlist/#a73fbb834524be9f7106e907bff83cf06">MIToSUnit</a>&#91;J&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Pred : SUI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#ae2b43854b542de66eec6475adc48f56c">Preds</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Pred.getSUnit() == SUJ &amp;&amp; Pred.getLatency() &gt; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1934"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pred.getLatency();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a65ef9c94df8b5109e5ad589ea303da44"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a65ef9c94df8b5109e5ad589ea303da44">HexagonPacketizerList::producesStall</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonpacketizerlist/#a82b468a911dfb66ebd0e9dfafd6ec6a1">calcStall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore stall unless it stalls more than previous instruction in packet</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PacketStalls)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> &gt; PacketStallCycles;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
